com.bham.bd.components.characters.agents

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.entity.MovingEntity
        • com.bham.bd.components.characters.GameCharacter
          • com.bham.bd.components.characters.agents.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Neuron, Nova, Shooter, Splitter, Splitter.MiniSplitter, Tank, Teaser, Trapper

    public abstract class Agent
extends GameCharacter

    Generic enemy bot

    This class defines all the common behavior an enemy character can show. All the method calls are determined by the state machine each enemy has.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Point2D destination
      Next point the agent should move towards in a straight line

      1 or 0, i.e., shoot or normal value the agent should know about when it reaches an edge

      Navigation Service used to get path edges which lead to a certain position
      protected LinkedList<PathEdge> pathEdges
      List of path edges the agent should follow to get to a certain position
      private int timeTillSearch
      Time before a new navigation request if the target is dynamic (e.g., moving character)

      • Agent

        protected Agent(double x,
                double y,
                double speed,
                double hp,
                Side side)
        Constructs a character instance with directionSet initialized to empty
        Parameters:
        x - top left x coordinate of the enemy
        y - top left y coordinate of the enemy
        speed - value which defines the initial velocity
        hp - health points the enemy should have

    • Method Detail

      • navigate

        protected void navigate(ItemType itemType)
        Finds path to a specified item type if it has not already been found
        Parameters:
        itemType - type of item that should be navigated

      • search

        protected void search(ItemType itemType)
        Navigates to a specific item type (if needed) and moves towards that direction
        Parameters:
        itemType - type of item that should be searched

      • face

        protected void face(Point2D toward)
        Changes angle to align with a specified point
        Parameters:
        toward - position to face

      • face

        protected void face(ItemType itemType)
        Changes angle to align with a specified closest item type

        Note: if some ally target was followed and found but there is another ally standing closer but behind an obstacle, this method will make the enemy aim at that ally. So free path condition must be checked. Alternatively, in getClosestCenter() only those distances could be filtered if they don't intersect any obstacles.

        Parameters:
        itemType - object to face

      • shoot

        protected void shoot(double threshold,
                     double... angles)
        Shoots bullet(-s) straight or at specified angles with a random probability
        Parameters:
        threshold - value between 0 and 1 above which the shoot() method would be run
        angles - degrees at which multiple bullets should be fired

      • shootObstacle

        protected boolean shootObstacle()
        Shoots a bullet at an obstacle from a distance of at max 4 nodes to the obstacle
        Returns:
        true if it is needed to shoot at an obstacle and false otherwise

      • layRandomTrap

        protected void layRandomTrap(double outerRadius)
        Lays a random trap trigger defined in TriggerType
        Parameters:
        outerRadius - radius within which the trap should be placed

      • takeOver

        protected void takeOver()
        In this behaviour the AI will try to take over the home base

      • createFSM

        protected abstract StateMachine createFSM()
        Abstract method which all child classes should fill with their own unique Finite State Machine
        Returns:
        the StateMachine for that specific enemy/ally
